mapper.select: SELECT o.id,o.name,o.intro,o.address,o.phone,o.num,o.num_in,o.num_remain, ot.sec_type organType,ot.fir_type organTypeId,d.value districtName,o.work,o.service_time,o.web_url,o.img_url,o.require,o.institution FROM organ o LEFT JOIN auto_value d on d.id=o.district_id,organ_type ot,sysuser u,user_organ uo WHERE o.organ_type_id=ot.id AND o.id=uo.organ_id AND uo.user_id=u.id AND u.username=#{username}
